ai-patthana23.58:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.58:0.3_0: Setting on what is inside, in oneself, during the internal and external based on what is seen.
ai-patthana23.58:1.1_0: no repulsion of the teaching is not visible in this way,
ai-patthana23.58:1.1_1: There is a condition for six objects, six grounds for a funeral pyre, none.
ai-patthana23.58:2.1_0: Not for the visible objects, not for the external enemy, nor by means of the external objection and non-object condition.
ai-patthana23.58:2.1_1: There is a condition for six objects, six grounds for a funeral pyre, none.
ai-patthana23.58:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor do he gives rise to the repetition of repulsion. Their cause is a condition for the internal and external object.
ai-patthana23.58:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.58:4.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor do he gives rise to the external causes.
ai-patthana23.58:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.58:5.1_0: But even a time of later she roams and transmigratesmigrating, opposite sex, or even one of the same questions.
